classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of inorganic compounds known as alkaline earth metal phosphates. These are inorganic compounds in which the largest oxoanion is phosphate, and in which the heaviest atom not in an oxoanion is an alkaline earth metal.

drug-interaction.name: Succinylcholine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Succinylcholine can be increased when used in combination with Magnesium phosphate.
